name: Python
content: I am proficient in Python and have used it extensively for ETL, data analysis, and few machine learning projects. I am familiar with libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.

name: SQL
content: I have extensive experience and skills using various tools based on SQL including BigQuery, MySql, Microsoft SQL, etc. I have worked with these on several projects.

name: Docker
content: I have experience with Docker and have used it for containerizing my applications, managing dependencies, and simplifying deployment processes.

name: Kubernetes
content: I have experience with Kubernetes and have used it for orchestrating containerized applications, managing clusters, and scaling applications.

name: Machine Learning
content: I have a strong understanding of machine learning concepts and have implemented various algorithms for classification, regression, clustering, etc. I am familiar with libraries like Scikit-learn, matplotlib, plotly, scipy, and many ML libraries like Random forest, XGBoost, etc. .

name: HTML5
content: HTML was the first language I learned when I started learning programming. Over the last 8 years, I have used it to build websites and web applications. I have experience with HTML5 APIs such as Canvas, WebSockets, and Web Workers.

name: SQL (Postgres)
content: I have experience with SQL and have used PostgreSQL for managing relational databases, writing complex queries, and optimizing database performance.

name: MongoDB
content: I have used MongoDB to build REST APIs and GraphQL APIs. I opt to use MongoDB when I want to build a prototype quickly and iterate on it, without worrying about the schema.

name: Kafka
content: While I am yet to use Kafka in a professional setting, I have used it to build a distributed system for an academic project. I have experience with Kafka Streams and Zookeeper

name: NumPy
content: I am proficient in NumPy, a fundamental package for scientific computing with Python. I have used NumPy for array manipulation, linear algebra, and mathematical operations.

name: Pandas
content: I am proficient in Pandas, a fast, powerful, and flexible open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. I have used Pandas for data cleaning, data exploration, and data analysis.

name: Helm
content: I have experience with Helm, a package manager for Kubernetes. I have used Helm to manage Kubernetes applications, install charts, and upgrade releases.

name: Azure
content: I have experience with Microsoft Azure, a cloud computing service. I have used Azure to deploy and manage applications, store data, and run virtual machines.

name: Bash
content: I have experience with Bash, a Unix shell and command language. I have used Bash to write shell scripts for automation, system administration, and data processing.
